org.oasis.openc2.lycan

Class OpenC2Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.oasis.openc2.lycan.OpenC2Message

  • public class OpenC2Message
extends java.lang.Object
    OpenC2Message is the base object that should be used when working with OpenC2 request messages. At a minimum all OpenC2 messages must have an action and a target. Id, actuator and args are optional.

    • Constructor Summary

        Parameters:
        id - UUID to uniquely identify the message
        action - ActionType that describes the OpenC2 message
        target - Target object for the message
